data.text: @crustybumbler It can’t be beyond science to make them like delicious chewy gummies SURELY
@_TraceyNo They're not as bad as vitamins, but four at once is a bit much. They taste rank though so I'm not doing them one at a time
@crustybumbler Bluuuuurgh. I’d take a handful of smol over one big (fnar). My current antibiotics are just unnecessarily girthy
Who replied from a locked account, why would you do that?
@_TraceyNo Haha I swallow pills by the handful these days, I used to choke but now I just deep throat them
@crustybumbler Oof this pic made me gag. Not good with lorge pills. Good luck x
